Luka viene akumizzato in Silencer e ruba le voci per vendicarsi di un produttore musicale che ha trattato male Marinette. Ladybug e Chat Noir dovranno alzare la voce per fermarlo!
Kagami viene akumizzata in Oni-Chan. Armata di una maschera magica, vuole tenere Lila lontana da Adrien... per sempre. Riusciranno Ladybug e Chat Noir a farla ragionare?
Sabrina viene akumizzata da Papillon. Diventata Miraculer, può rubare i poteri dei supereroi ed è determinata a mostrare a Chloé che vale tanto quanto Ladybug.
Ladybug e Chat Noir hanno perso la memoria, e un misterioso cattivo si aggira per Parigi. Riusciranno i nostri eroi a sconfiggere Oblivio e farne solo un brutto ricordo?

Vivica, la chitarrista di Jagged Stone, viene akumizzata in Desperada. Armata di una chitarra malvagia, vuole punire Jagged Stone per averla licenziata. Ladybug e Chat Noir faranno meglio a darci dent

La mamma di Max viene akumizzata in Startrain. Ai controlli di un treno volante, vuole realizzare il suo sogno di diventare un'astronauta. Si prospetta una missione ad alta quota per Ladybug e Chat No
La signora Mendeleiev viene akumizzata in Acchiappakwami. Vuole catturare Tikki e Plagg per dimostrare al mondo che queste magiche creature sono reali! Ladybug e Chat Noir dovranno proteggere il loro

Quando il passato del Maestro Fu torna per perseguitarlo, per proteggere Marinette e Adrien, si riprende i loro Miraculous. Ma loro sono pronti a tutto pur di difenderlo, anche se ciò vuol dire affron
Max viene akumizzato di nuovo da Papillon. Diventato Gamer 2.0, cattura tutti gli ex cattivi akumizzati e sfida Ladybug e Chat Noir a giocare contro di lui per liberarli.
Aurore Boreale viene akumizzata di nuovo. Diventata Tempestosa 2, fa piombare la Terra in un inverno senza fine. Ladybug e Chat Noir dovranno mantenere il sangue freddo per fermarla!
La madre di Kagami viene akumizzata in Ikari Gozen. Armata di spada, vuole punire Kagami per averle disobbedito e intrappolarla per sempre in un'armatura gigante.
Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano Timetagger, un supercattivo venuto dal futuro per impossessarsi dei loro Miraculous. Il futuro di Parigi è nelle loro mani!

A causa di un malinteso, un fan di Adrien viene akumizzato in Guastafeste. Convinto che il suo idolo l'abbia preso in giro, è determinato a vendicarsi. Riusciranno Ladybug e la sua squadra a tirarlo s

Manon diventa di nuovo la Burattinaia, ed è determinata a divertirsi come non mai in un parco giochi unico: il museo delle cere Grévin! Ladybug e Chat Noir non possono stare con le mani in mano se vog
Quando Marinette fa un grave errore, deve affrontarne le conseguenze lottando con l'ultima persona che avrebbe mai immaginato potesse venire akumizzata…

Quando Felix, il cugino di Adrien, semina discordia tra Adrien e i suoi amici, Alya, Rose e Juleka vengono akumizzate nel Trio delle Castigatrici. Riusciranno Ladybug e Chat Noir a fermare le tre catt
Lila manipola tutti i cari di Marinette per farli rivoltare contro di lei, ma un problema più grande aspetta Marinette: dovrà affrontare un sentimostro che ha assunto le sembianze di... Ladybug!
Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano i Bourgeois. Diventati Mangiamore, un Cerbero con due teste, divorano tutto l'amore di Parigi. Riusciranno i nostri eroi a salvare l'amore?
Papillon akumizza Chloé in Miracle Queen per aiutarla a prendere il controllo di tutti i portatori di Miraculous. Riusciranno Ladybug e Chat Noir a sfuggire al piano malefico?
Il fratellino di Nino viene akumizzato in Chris Master e manda dei giocattoli giganti a scatenare il caos nell'innevata Parigi per trovare Babbo Natale.
Un amico di Marinette viene akumizzato in Verità. Usando il suo potere per costringere le persone a dire la verità, vuole conoscere il segreto di Marinette... e anche quello di Ladybug e Chat Noir!
Un'amica di Adrien viene akumizzata in Bugie. Col suo potere può stanare le bugie e vuole usarlo per eliminarle dal mondo insieme a chi le dice… e ai supereroi!
Gli amici di Marinette vengono akumizzati nella Banda dei segreti, una squadra di supercattivi determinati a salvarla... che lei lo voglia o meno!
Il Sig. Ramier viene akumizzato in Mr. Piccione per la settantaduesima volta, e ora può trasformare le persone in piccioni malvagi!
Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano qualcuno che conoscono bene... e che non avrebbero mai immaginato di dover combattere un giorno.
Un nuovo arrivato nella cerchia di amici di Marinette viene akumizzato in Sole Crusher, un supercattivo gigante che può assorbire le persone. Ladybug e Chat Noir saranno all'altezza della missione?
Quando Chloe viene akumizzata in Queen Banana, Ladybug decide di affidare un Miraculous a un nuovo e promettente alleato per aiutarla a fermare il supercattivo.
Quando Reflekta sprofonda in un abisso di colpa senza fondo, Ladybug fa appello a un'alleata dall'ottimismo infallibile.
Cosa succederebbe se Falena Ombra creasse un temibile supercattivo mentre Marinette e Adrien non possono trasformarsi in Ladybug e Chat Noir?
Falena Ombra crea Sentibubbler, un temibile sentimostro che si fermerà solo se Rena Rouge tradirà Ladybug e Chat Noir!
Come Guardiano di Miraculous, Ladybug deve prendere decisioni difficili che influiscono sulle persone che le stanno accanto, ma non tutti sono pronti a vivere perennemente nell'ombra come lei...
Mentre Marinette pensa al suo futuro, a Parigi arriva un supercattivo. Il suo potere è quello di costringerele persone a vivere i loro sogni d'infanzia, ma per i nostri eroi diventa un vero incubo.
Quando Malediktator ritorna, ora affiancato da un Sentimonster, Ladybug affida a un amico e alleato devoto un Miraculous per aiutarla a salvare Parigi.
Un parente di Marinette viene akumizzato nel Simplificator, un super cattivo determinato a semplificare il nostro complesso mondo. Fermarlo non sarà però semplice per Ladybug e Chat Noir!
La Giornata di Galette è movimentata per Marinette! Tikki si comporta in modo molto strano e si presentano tre supercattivi! Riuscirà Ladybug a imporsi come regina della giornata?
A causa di un piano escogitato da Marinette, Papillon akumizza due cattivi. Ladybug e Chat Noir avranno bisogno di aiuto per fermare il duo malvagio.
Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano di nuovo Gelatone. Gelatone fa arrabbiare Ladybug dicendole che i due supereroi sono innamorati. Chat Noir incontra Marinette, combattuta da un romantico segreto.
E se Marinette non avesse altra scelta che lasciare Parigi il giorno in cui Papillombre ha deciso di creare un nuovo supercattivo?
Marinette si intrufola nella casa della famiglia Agreste durante una cena privata, ma scopre che alla festa c’è anche un supercattivo. Ladybug salverà la giornata, o meglio, la serata?
Che accadrebbe se Ladybug e Chat Noir scoprissero le identità segrete l’una dell’altro? Ladybug deve decide se rivelate l’identità di Chat Noir in modo da preservare il suo ruolo di Guardiana.

Un famoso comico viene akumizzato e trasformato nello Psycomedian. In grado di trasmettere qualsiasi emozione a chiunque, questo super-cattivo vuole cancellare il sorriso dal volto delle persone…inizi
A causa di un imprudente errore di Marinette, una dei suoi familiari più intimi viene akumizzata in Qilin, una terribile supercattiva. Ladybug oserà sfidarla?
Se Chat Noir decidesse di lasciare il suo ruolo e restituire il suo Miraculous a Ladybug, chi potrebbe sostituirlo?
Una delle vittime preferite di Falena Oscura viene akumizzata in Penalteam, un tremendo team di supercattivi e Ladybug chiama i suoi supereroi per affrontare questa squadra. Che vinca il migliore!
Senza che Ladybug e Chat Noir se ne accorgano, Papillombre sferra il suo attacco finale…
Il piano di Papillombre sta per intrappolare Ladybug e Chat Noir, minacciando di sconvolgere il loro destino per sempre...
Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano un avversario in possesso del Miraculous del Coniglio in una corsa attraverso il tempo... e le loro precedenti avventure.
Con il passare dei giorni, non si presenta neanche un cattivo akumizzato per tormentare Parigi. Possibile che Monarch si sia arreso?

A scuola, una rete segreta è determinata a scoprire come funziona il nuovo potere di Monarch scatenando deliberatamente un’akumizzazione. Ladybug e Chat Noir saranno d'accordo con un simile piano?
Mentre Marinette e Adrien si interrogano sui loro sentimenti, Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano un cattivo... e i suoi 17 scagnozzi!
Mentre tutto si capovolge nelle loro vite sentimentali, Ladybug e Chat Noir devono scambiare il loro Miraculous per sfuggire a uno spietato cattivo.

Quando Ladybug e Chat Noir affrontano di nuovo Gelatone, non sanno che stanno per fare una scoperta agghiacciante!
Dispiaciuti di vedere i loro guardiani così tristi perché devono rinunciare alle loro vite sentimentali, Tikki e Plagg fanno una drastica scelta che cambierà molte cose a Parigi…
Dispiaciuti di vedere i loro guardiani così sfortunati in amore, Tikki e Plagg hanno fatto una drastica scelta che ha cambiato molte cose a Parigi… nel bene e nel male.
Quando gli amici di Marinette decidono di aiutarla ad avvicinarsi ad Adrien, scoprono che, nella vita, è sempre meglio essere chiari e onesti.

Chloe e Monarch sono più potenti che mai. Ladybug e Chat Noir si interrogano sui propri poteri. Le vite di Marinette e Adrien stanno per cambiare per sempre.
Marinette scopre un segreto del tutto inaspettato.
Monarch ha posizionato le ultime pedine del suo piano malvagio sulla sua scacchiera del male. Ladybug e Chat Noir sono spacciati? Monarch vincerà alla fine?

Marinette e i suoi amici vogliono combattere attivamente l'inquinamento da plastica a Parigi e si ritrovano ad affrontare un avversario senza costume, ma più temibile persino di alcuni supercattivi…

duas cabeças, eles devoram todo o amor em Paris. Será que os nossos heróis vão conseguir salvar o amor?
Hawk Moth akumatiza Chloe em Miracle Queen para a ajudar a assumir o controlo de todos os utilizadores de Miraculous. Será que Ladybug e Cat Noir escaparão a esse plano fatal?
O irmão mais novo de Nino é akumatizado em Chris Master e envia brinquedos gigantes para causar estragos numa Paris nevada, à procura do Pai Natal.
Um amigo da Marinette é akumatizado no Truth. Usando o seu poder para obrigar as pessoas a dizer a verdade, ele quer saber o segredo da Marinette… e também da Ladybug e do Gato Noir!
Uma amiga de Adrien é akumatizada em Mentiras. Capaz de fazer as mentiras desaparecerem, ela está determinada em livrar o mundo das mentiras e daqueles que as dizem… incluindo super-heróis!
Os amigos da Marinette são akumatizados no Gangue dos Segredos, uma equipa de supervilões determinados a salvá-la… quer ela queira ou não!
O Sr. Ramier é akumatizado em pombo pela 72.ª vez e agora consegue transformar as pessoas em pombos maus!
Ladybug e Gato Noir enfrentam alguém que conhecem bem e contra nunca imaginaram ter de lutar um dia.
Um novato no círculo de amigos da Marinette é akumatizado no Sole Crusher, um supervilão gigante que consegue absorver pessoas. Será que Ladybug e Gato Noir estão à altura?
Quando Chloe é akumatizada na Rainha Banana, Ladybug decide confiar um Miraculous a um novo e promissor aliado para a ajudar a travar a supervilã.
Quando Reflekta se fecha num abismo de culpa sem fim, Ladybug chama um aliado com um otimismo infalível.
O que aconteceria se Shadow Moth criasse um temível vilão enquanto Marinette e Adrien não se conseguissem transformar em Ladybug e Gato Noir?
Shadow Moth cria Sentibolhas, um temível sentimonstro que só vai parar se Rena Rouge trair Ladybug e Gato Noir!
Como Guardiã dos Milagrosos, Ladybug tem de tomar decisões difíceis que afetam as pessoas à sua volta. Mas nem todos estão prontos para viverem sempre escondidos como ela…
Enquanto Marinette pensa sobre o futuro dela, um supervilão aparece em Paris. Capaz de forçar as pessoas a viver os seus sonhos de infância, ele transforma-se num pesadelo para os nossos heróis.
Quando Malediktator regressa, apoiado por um Sentimonstro, Ladybug confia a um amigo e aliado um Miraculous para a ajudar a salvar Paris.
Um parente da Marinette é akumatizado em Simpleman, um supervilão determinado a simplificar o mundo demasiado complexo. Não vai ser fácil para a Ladybug e para o Gato Noir pará-lo!
O Dia de Galette é um dia agitado para Marinette! Tikki age de forma muito estranha e surgem três supervilões! Será que Ladybug ainda consegue ser a rainha do dia?
Por causa de um plano da Marinette, Shadow Moth akumatiza dois vilões. Ladybug e Gato Noir vão precisar de ajuda para travar o duo maléfico.
Ladybug e Gato Noir voltam a enfrentar Glaciator. Glaciator irrita Ladybug ao insistir que os super-heróis estão apaixonados. Gato Noir encontra Marinette, que se debate com o romance secreto.
E se, no dia em que Shadow Moth decide criar um novo supervilão, Marinette tivesse mesmo de deixar Paris?
Marinette entra furtivamente na casa de Agreste durante um jantar privado e descobre que um supervilão também está a invadir a festa. Irá Ladybug salvar o dia, ou melhor, a soirée?
E se Ladybug e Gato Noir descobrissem as identidades secretas um do outro? Ladybug tem de decidir se deve revelar a identidade de Gato Noir, para que permaneça a Guardiã.
Um comediante famoso é akumatizado como Psicocomediante. Capaz de impor emoções a qualquer um, ele quer limpar os sorrisos das caras de toda a gente… a começar pela Ladybug e o Gato Noir!
Devido a um erro imprudente de Marinette, um dos seus parentes mais próximos é akumatizado em Qilin, um temível supervilão. Será que Ladybug vai atrever-se a enfrentá-lo?
Se Gato Noir decidisse desistir e devolver o seu Miraculous a Ladybug, quem poderia substituí-lo?
Quando uma das vítimas favoritas de Shadow Moth é akumatizada na Penalteam, uma temível equipa de supervilões, Ladybug chama os seus próprios super-heróis para enfrentá-la. Que ganhe a melhor equipa!
Às escondidas de Ladybug e Gato Noir, Shadow Moth, pacientemente, põe em marcha o ataque final…
A armadilha de Shadow Moth encurrala a Ladybug e o Gato Noir ameaçando virar-lhes o destino de ambos de pernas para o ar, para sempre…
Ladybug e Gato Noir enfrentam um oponente que agora tem na sua posse o Miraculous do Coelho numa corrida no tempo… e as aventuras anteriores deles.
Com o passar dos dias, nem um único vilão akumatizado aparece para atormentar Paris. Será possível que Monarch tenha desistido?
E se o pior pesadelo de Ladybug se tornasse realidade? E se Monarch aparecesse na casa de Marinette Dupain-Cheng?... Seria ela capaz de lhe escapar?
Monarca confia a um vilão akumatizado o poder do Júbilo, que mostra às pessoas os seus desejos mais profundos. Será que Ladybug e Gato Noir escaparão a este poder perigoso?
Uma rede secreta na escola está determinada a descobrir como funciona o novo poder do Monarca provocando deliberadamente uma akumatização. Será que Ladybug e Cat Noir concordam com tal plano?
Enquanto Marinette e Adrien pensam nos seus sentimentos, Ladybug e Gato Noir enfrentam uma vilã... e os seus 17 capangas!
Enquanto tudo está de pernas para o ar na vida amorosa deles, Ladybug e Gato Noir têm de trocar o seu Miraculous para escaparem a um vilão implacável.
Enquanto visitava o museu do Louvre, Marinette descobre os segredos do kwagatama que a Tikki lhe deu no seu aniversário.
Enquanto Ladybug e Gato Noir enfrentam Glaciator novamente, os nossos heróis não sabem que estão prestes a fazer uma descoberta arrepiante!
Ao lamentarem-se por verem os seus donos tão tristes por terem de desistir dos seus sentimentos, Tikki e Plagg fazem uma escolha drástica que vai mudar muitas coisas em Paris…
Com pena por verem os seus detentores sem sorte no amor, Tikki e Plagg fizeram um grande barulho que está a mudar muitas coisas em Paris... para o bem e para o mal.
Quando os amigos de Marinette decidem ajudá-la a aproximar-se de Adrien, o grupo inteiro descobre que deve dizer-se sempre claramente as coisas aos amigos.
Como filho de uma celebridade, Luka desperta um interesse especial em Bob Roth, que faz tudo por dinheiro! Mas Luka faz tudo para defender os seus valores e amigos.
E se a resposta para os problemas da relação de Marinette estão no seu próprio passado? Quando não era a Marinette que conhecemos hoje…
Quando Monarca deteta uma ocasião única para obter uma verdadeira segunda oportunidade, ele está pronto para fazer qualquer coisa, ainda que isso signifique que esta pode ser a sua última hipótese de
Enquanto Marinette e Adrien se aproximam, Lila usa o seu talento para manipular Kagami. Irão as mentiras venenosas de Lila destruir a amizade entre Kagami, Marinette e Adrien?
Quando Marinette e Zoe são escolhidas para organizar a festa de fim de ano da escola, um inimigo comum das raparigas tentará arruinar esta bela amizade.
Adrien tem de participar numa dança organizada pelo seu pai e pela Sra. Tsurugi.
Marinette decide ter uma conversa franca com o pai do rapaz que ela ama. A sua coragem inspira a sua amiga Kagami, que finalmente se atreve a falar com a sua mãe…
Quando Lila convoca novas eleições para substituir Marinette como delegada de turma, a campanha corre mal. Cuidado, pois, com Lila, as coisas não costumam ser o que parecem…
A escola está quase a terminar e Lila e Chloe devem defender o futuro dos colegas perante os professores. Marinette preocupa-se: qual será o próximo plano maléfico destas duas?
O fim do ano letivo está próximo e a rebelião cresce. Monarca decide implementar um plano que põe em perigo a sua identidade secreta… e Ladybug e Gato Noir.
Chloe e Monarca estão mais poderosos do que nunca. Ladybug e Gato Noir interrogam-se sobre os seus poderes. E as vidas de Marinette e Adrien estão prestes a mudar para sempre.
Marinette descobre um segredo completamente inesperado.
O Monarca acabou de colocar as últimas peças do seu plano maquiavélico no seu tabuleiro de xadrez do mal. Estarão Ladybug e Gato Noir condenados? Será que o Monarca vai acabar por vencer?
O plano final do Monarca está em andamento, parece que nada o poderá deter: a própria Ladybug foi apanhada, enquanto o mundo mergulha no caos.
Enquanto Marinette e os seus amigos querem lutar de forma ativa contra a poluição em Paris, os nossos heróis vão enfrentar um oponente em roupas comuns, mais temível até do que alguns supervilões...
「キッズプラス」のお天気ガールコンテストで負けた少女がホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。ストーミーウェザーとなった彼女は、自分に投票しなかった人たちに復讐する。スーパーヒーローたちを嵐が待ち受ける！
ニノは親友アドリアンの誕生日パーティーを開く許可をもらおうとするが、彼の父親に断られる。すると落ち込んだニノがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。バブラーとなった彼は、大人たちを消そうとする。レディバグとシャノワールは彼のシャボン玉から逃げられるのか？
マリネットの友達アリックスがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。タイムブレーカーとなった彼女は、クラスメートにうっかり壊されてしまった時計を取り戻すべく過去に戻ろうとする。レディバグには時間がない！
若きエジプト学者のジャリルがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。ファラオとなった彼は、アルヤを儀式の生けにえにしようとする！レディバグとシャノワールがファラオを止めるには、ミイラと戦い、古代の秘密を暴くしかない！
ハト愛好家ラミエルがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。ミスター・ピジョンとなった彼は、パリの街を大好きなハトの王国に変えようとする。我らがヒーローが彼を止めるためには、ハトの群れを乱すしかない！

eps.t: レディー・ワイファイ
eps.ds: マリネットの親友アルヤがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。レディー・ワイファイとなった彼女は、クロエがレディバグだと信じ込み、正体を暴こうとする。レディバグは何としても秘密を隠し通さなければならない！
マリネットに恋するクラスメートのナタニエルがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。イラストレーターとなって、彼をからかったクロエに復讐しようとする。我らがヒーローはクロエを守るために創造性を発揮できるか？
警察官であるサブリナの父親がホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。ロジャーコップとなった彼は、パリの街を独裁的に支配しようとする。レディバグとシャノワールは悪を正す者の真の姿を示せるか？
クラスの皆で短編映画を撮影中にからかわれたミレーヌは、アクマタイズされ、恐ろしいモンスター、ホリフィケーターになってしまう。巨大な悪のモンスターに誰もがおびえる。ただしレディバグとシャノワールは例外だ。

eps.t: ダーク・キューピッド
eps.ds: クロエにフラれ、からかわれたキムは、アクマタイズされてダーク・キューピッドになってしまう。闇の天使は、矢と悪のバラを武器に皆の“好き”を“嫌い”に変えようとする！レディバグとシャノワールは皆の愛情を取り戻せるのか？

eps.t: レディバグとシャノワール
eps.ds: どんな物語にも始まりがある。普通の高校生、マリネットとアドリアンがいかにしてレディバグとシャノワールになったのか？なぜホーク・モスはミラキュラスを執拗に狙うのか？ミラキュラスはここから始まった！
自信を失い、レディバグに変身することを拒むマリネット。しかしパリの街やシャノワール、親友アルヤが危機に陥って…皆を救えるのはレディバグしかいない！
若き彫刻家はレディバグに夢中。シャノワールへの嫉妬心につけ入られ、ホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。シャノワールそっくりなコピーキャットとなった彼は、シャノワールを消し、レディバグを手に入れようとする！
パートナーに裏切られたフレッド・アプレールはアクマタイズされ、マイムになってしまう。彼が演じると全てが現実に。それを利用して怒りをブチまけるマイム。彼を止めるため、レディバグとシャノワールは素早いパフォーマンスが求められる！

eps.t: プリンセス・フレグランス
eps.ds: マリネットの友達ローズがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。プリンセス・フレグランスとなった彼女は、パリを訪れた王子を誘拐する。レディバグとシャノワールの前に危険な香りのする新たな敵が現る！
パリ市長選に負けたアルマン・ダルジェンクールがアクマタイズされてしまう。ダークブレードとなった彼は、剣を武器に区長ブルジョワの座を奪おうとする。.レディバグとシャノワールはパリの街を守るため、彼と剣を交える！
キムにからかわれた動物園の飼育係オーティスがアクマタイズされ、ブラックパンサーのアニマンになってしまう。街に混乱を引き起こすアニマン。彼を止めるため、レディバグとシャノワールはパリのジャングルを駆け回る！
ガブリエル・アグレストに中傷された、催眠術師サイモン・グリモールがアクマタイズされてしまう。サイモン・セッズとなった彼は、人々を自分の思いどおりに動かす。サイモンの命令：レディバグとシャノワールを倒せ！
ロックスターのジェゲッド・ストーンのファンであるヴィンセントがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。ピクセラトールとなった彼は、彼の大好きなスターを永遠に写真の中に閉じ込めようとする。レディバグとシャノワールはフラッシュに気をつけろ！
ジャゲッド・ストーンがアクマタイズされてしまう。超ハードロックな悪魔、ギター・ヴィランとなった彼は、若くて傲慢なポップ歌手に復讐しようとする。彼を止めるため、レディバグとシャノワールは機転を利かせられるか？
マリネットのせいでビデオゲームのトーナメントに出場する代表から落とされたマックスがアクマタイズされてしまう。ゲーマーとなった彼は、巨大なロボットを操り、パリの街に大惨事をもたらす。レディバグとシャノワールが彼を止めなければゲームオーバーだ！
クロエのせいでクラス写真に写れなかったジュリカがアクマタイズされてしまう。リフレクタとなった彼女は、皆を自分のコピーに変えていく。シャノワールも犠牲になった今、彼女を止められるのはたった一人…レディバグしかいない！
マリネットが預かっていたナディアの娘マノンは、人形を盗んだと叱られた後、アクマタイズされてしまう。パペッターとなったマノンは、レディバグとシャノワールの人形を盗んで、本物の二人を操ろうとする。我らがヒーローがコントロール不能に！
レディバグとの口論の後、クロエはアクマタイズされ、アンチバグになってしまう。レディバグは同じパワーを持つ敵と戦うことになって…はたして彼女はバグ対決に勝てるのか？
料理コンテストでクロエに中傷されたマリネットの大叔父さんがアクマタイズされ、カン・フードになってしまう。カン・フードの料理を食べた人たちは、彼のいいなりに。レディバグとシャノワールでも彼を止めるのは朝飯前とはいかない！
レディバグに意地悪されたため、彼女を敵視する新入生のリラ。彼女はアクマタイズされ、幻想の女王ヴォルピーナになってしまう。ヴォルピーナはレディバグとシャノワールを煙に巻いてしまうのか？
マリネットがホーク・モスの正体を探ろうとしていた時、アドリアンの父親ガブリエル・アグレストがアクマタイズされ、コレクターになってしまう。レディバグとシャノワールはコレクターを倒し、ホーク・モスの正体を突き止めることができるのか？
ナディア・シャマックがアクマタイズされて、プライム・クイーンになってしまう。スマートウォッチを装備したプライム・クイーンは、視聴率を上げるため、レディバグとシャノワールに二人が恋愛関係にあることを無理やり認めさせようとする。そんなプライム・クイーンの暴走を我らがスーパーヒーローが止める！
パリの伝説のアイスクリーム屋アンドレがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。グラシエーターとなった彼によって、人々はアイスに変えられ、溶けてしまった！レディバグとシャノワールが冷ややかな関係なままでは、彼を止められない！
クロエに中傷された執事がホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。抱きしめた人を操ることができるディスぺア・ベアとなった彼は、クロエに復讐しようとする。レディバグとシャノワールは自分たちが操られるわけにはいかない！
ジャゲッド・ストーンの助手ペニー・ローリングがアクマタイズされて、トラブルメーカーとなってしまう。彼女は皆の問題を解決する人から問題を起こす人に！レディバグとシャノワールは街中の人々がトラブルに陥る前に彼女を止めなければならない！
アクマタイズされた子供がジャイガンタイタンとなってしまう。巨大な赤ん坊はキャンディーを求めて、通りにある物を壊しまくる！レディバグとシャノワールにとって、ジャイガンタイタンを止めることは遊び半分とはいかないようだ…
マスクをかぶったミステリアスなフェンシング選手がホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされ、リポストになってしまう。屈辱を与えられたと感じて、アドリアンともう一度戦って、サーベルを武器にリベンジしたいリポスト。彼を守るためにレディバグはヴィランと剣を交えなければならない！
マリネットの祖母がアクマタイズされてしまう。ベファーナとなった彼女は、おばあちゃんより友達と過ごすことを選んだマリネットにお仕置きをしようとする。はたしてレディバグはアクマタイズされた実の祖母と戦うことができるのか？
若きアメリカ人歌手がアクマタイズされてしまう。フライトニンゲールとなった彼女は、魔法のマイクでパリの街を巨大なミュージカルに変えようとする。彼女を止めるために、レディバグとシャノワールはリズムに合わせて戦わなければならない！
アドリアンのボディーガードがアクマタイズされて、ゴリジラになってしまう。すさまじい力と研ぎ澄まされた嗅覚で、アドリアンを捜してパリの街中を追う。レディバグとシャノワールは、猿真似では彼に勝てない！
マルコフという名の小さくて繊細なロボットがアクマタイズされて、どんな物にも生命を宿すことのできるロボスタスになってしまう。はたして我らがスーパーヒーローは、このとても人間らしいロボットを説き伏せることができるのか？

アルヤの家でお泊り会を楽しむマリネットとアルヤ。アルヤの双子の妹エタとエラはイタズラしてばかり。アルヤに叱られた双子は、ホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。制御不能の小さなモンスター、サポティスは食べることで増殖していき、街中に大惨事を引き起こす。あっという間に混乱が広がり、イタズラ放題のサポティスに数でも劣るため、レディバグは新たなスーパーヒーローを招集する。アルヤにキツネのミラキュラ
アクマタイズされ、サイレンになってしまった泳ぎの得意なオンディーヌ。キムに思いを寄せる彼女は、パリの街を王子様のための水中の王国にしようとする。はたしてレディバグとシャノワールは形勢逆転できるのか？
ダモクレス校長はアクマタイズされ、ダーク・オウルになってしまう。彼は超ハイテク機器を武器に、自分に恥をかかせたレディバグとシャノワールを打ち負かして屈辱を与えようとする。ダーク・オウルに勝つため、我らがヒーローは彼の羽根を逆立たせるしかない！

今日はマリネットの大好きなバスティエ先生の誕生日。しかしクロエのひどい意地悪のせいで、マリネットがアクマタイズされそうになる！マリネットを守ったバスティエ先生が代わりにアクマタイズされてしまう。ホーク・モスは先生を悪魔の黒い口紅を武器とするゾンビズーに変える。そして彼女は悪魔のキスをパリの人々に送り、無理やり互いを愛するように強要して、街に愛を広めようとする。ただし思いやりのないクロエを除いて。レ

eps.t: キャプテン・ハードロック
eps.ds: ジュレカの母親がアクマタイズされ、キャプテン・ハードロックになってしまう。彼女は難攻不落の船の舵を取り、海賊の剣を武器にして、街中に音楽を鳴り響かせようとする。レディバグとシャノワール、乗船の準備を！
フィギュアスケートのコーチであるフィリップはアクマタイズされ、フローザーになってしまう。彼は悪のアイススケートを武器に、パリの街を氷の王国に変えようとする！レディバグとシャノワールが冷ややかな関係のままでは、彼に勝てない！
学校の友達のマークがアクマタイズされ、リバーサーになってしまう。マリネットとナタニエルにバカにされたと思い込み、復讐を誓う。はたしてレディバグとシャノワールは形勢逆転できるのか？
ガブリエル・アグレストに屈辱を受けたクロエの母親がアクマタイズされて、スタイル・クイーンになってしまう。ステッキを使って、アドリアンを襲い、復讐しようとする。はたしてレディバグは、シャノワールなしでスタイル・クイーンを止められるのか？
母親を感心させるためにクイーンビーに変身したクロエがアクマタイズされて、クイーンワスプになってしまう。はたしてレディバグとシャノワールは、このスーパーヴィランになったスーパーヒーローを倒すことができるのか？
クロエにパリを去ると脅されたブルジョワ市長がアクマタイズされて、マレディクテーターになってしまう。絶対的な力を手に入れた彼は、娘が自分と一緒に暮らしてくれるように娘の夢をかなえようとする。はたしてレディバグは彼を止められるのか？
アルヤの姉ノラがアクマタイズされて、アナンシになってしまう。巨大なクモ女になった彼女は、アルヤにパリの危険さを示そうとする。レディバグとシャノワールは彼女を止めることができるのか？
ティッキーの不在時に謎のスーパーヴィランがパリの人々の悪夢に生命を与えていることに気づいたマリネット。はたしてマリネットは変身して、この悪夢に終止符を打つことができるのか？
パリの街は、一人一人がいい行いをするよう心がける『ヒーローズ・デー』で盛り上がっていた。しかしホーク・モスが長年準備してきた計画を実行に移すため、助手のナタリーをアクマタイズして、カタリストに変えたことで、悪夢の一日が始まる…
カタリストの助けによって、ホーク・モスは恐ろしい計画を実行に移し、これまでの全てのヴィランを再アクマタイズする。はたしてレディバグとスーパーヒーローチームは、ホーク・モスと彼の最強軍団に打ち勝つことができるのか？
レディバグのせいで、サンタがホーク・モスによってアクマタイズされてしまう。サンタクロウズとなった彼は、パリ史上最悪のクリスマスイブをプレゼントしようとする。はたしてレディバグとシャノワールはクリスマスを救うことができるのか？
ウソを問いただされたリラは、自分をアクマタイズするようホーク・モスに頼む。カメレオンとなった彼女は、誰にでも変身することが可能に。手始めはアドリアンだ！
映画監督がアクマタイズされ、アニマエストロに。スーパーヴィランのマスクを武器に、世界にアニメ監督の底力を見せようと決意する。
マリネットのおじいちゃんがアクマタイズされてベーカリックスとなる。特別な力を手に入れた彼は、現代的すぎるものをすべて破壊しようと決意。レディーバグとシャノワールは立ち向かえるか。
マスター・フーの旧友マリアンヌはアクマタイズされ、バックワーダーとなる。魔法の棒を手に入れた彼女は、失われた時を取り戻すため、他人から時間を奪う！レディーバグとシャノワールは一刻も無駄にできない！
ジュレカが再びリフレクタになってしまう。だが今回のスーパーヴィランは1人ではない。そしてマリネットとアドリアンのミラキュラスにはトラブル発生。ヒーローたちはリフレクタと彼女の仲間を止められるか？
トムはアクマタイズされ、巨大な番犬男ウェアダッドに。娘を外の世界から守ろうと、マリネットを魔法の牢獄に監禁する。マリネットは自分の父親を止められるか？
アクマタイズされサイレンサーとなって人々の声を盗み、マリネットを裏切った音楽プロデューサーに復讐しようとするルカ。彼を止めるにはレディバグとシャノワールは声を上げねばならない！
アクマタイズされオニチャンとなったカガミは魔法の角でリラをアドリアンから永久に引き離そうとする。レディバグとシャノワールは彼女を説得できるのか？
ホーク･モスにアクマタイズされミラキュラーとなりスーパーヒーローのパワーを盗めるようになったサブリナは自分がレディバグに負けないことをクロエに証明しようとする。
レディバグとシャノワールが記憶を失い、謎のヴィランはパリをうろついている。我らがヒーローたちはオブリビオを倒し悪い記憶として片づけることができるのか？
ジャゲッド･ストーンのギタリストがアクマタイズされデスペラーダに。邪悪なギターを手に自分をクビにしたジャゲッド･ストーンに仕返しをしようとする。レディバグとシャノワールは彼女を倒せるか！
マックスの母がアクマタイズされスタートレインに。空飛ぶ列車の操縦席で宇宙飛行士になる夢を果たそうとする。レディバグとシャノワールにとって高度な任務となりそうだ！
クワミバスターにアクマタイズされたメンデレイエフ先生はティッキーとプラッグを捕まえ、その存在を世間に証明しようとする。レディバグとシャノワールは何としても秘密を守らねばならない！
マスター･フーの過去がよみがえり彼はマリネットとアドリアンを守ろうと２人のミラキュラスを奪うが、マスター･フーを守るためなら、たとえパワーなしでセンチモンスターと対決するハメになろうとも２人に引き下がる気はない。
ホーク･モスに再びアクマタイズされゲーマー2.0となったマックスは過去にアクマタイズされたヴィランズを捕まえ、彼らの解放を賭けてレディバグとシャノワールにゲームの対戦を挑む。
オーロラが再びアクマタイズされストーミーウェザーとなり地上を永遠の冬にして閉ざそうとする。レディバグとシャノワールが彼女を阻止するには冷静でなければならない！
カガミの母親がアクマタイズされイカリゴゼンに。竹刀を武器に自分に背いたカガミを罰し巨大な腹の中に永遠に閉じ込めようとする。
レディバグとシャノワールが２人のミラキュラスを奪いに未来からやってきたスーパーヴィラン、タイムタガーと対決する。パリの未来は２人にかかっている！

eps.t: パーティー･クラッシャー
eps.ds: 誤解がもとでアドリアンのファンがアクマタイズされパーティー･クラッシャーに。大好きなアドリアンにバカにされたと思い込んだ彼は復讐を誓う。レディバグと仲間たちは彼の機嫌を直せるか？
再びパペッターとなったマノン。彼女は特別な遊び場、グレヴァン蝋人形館で前代未聞の遊びを繰り広げる。彼女を阻止するのにレディバグとシャノワールはじっとしてはいられない！
深刻な過ちを犯したマリネットは、それがもたらした結果に対峙しアクマタイズされるとは想像だにしなかった相手と戦わねばならない。
アドリアンのいとこフェリックスがアドリアンと仲間の間に不和の種をまき、アルヤ、ローズ、ジュレカはアクマタイズされパニッシャートリオに。レディバグとシャノワールはヴィラン３人組を阻止しフェリックスを改心させられるか。
リラはマリネットに近い仲間を操りマリネットと敵対させてしまうが、更に大きな問題がマリネットを待ち受ける。彼女が対決せねばならないセンチモンスターは何とレディバグそっくりなのだ！
レディバグとシャノワールがブルジョア夫妻と対決。ハートハンターとなった夫妻は２つの頭を持つケルベロスでパリ中の愛をむさぼってしまう。我らがヒーローたちは愛を救えるか。
ホーク･モスがクロエをミラクル・クイーンにアクマタイズしミラキュラスを着けた者を支配する。レディバグとシャノワールはこの破壊的な計画から逃れられるのか。
ニノの弟がアクマタイズされクリス･マスターとなり雪のパリに巨大なオモチャたちを放ち、サンタを捜す。
マリネットの友人がトゥルースにアクマタイズされてしまう。人に真実を言わせる能力を用いて、マリネットの秘密を聞き出そうとする…さらにレディバグとシャノワールの秘密も！
アドリアンの友人がトゥルースにアクマタイズされてしまう。ウソつきを消し去る能力を用いて、世界中のウソとウソつきを排除しようとする。そしてスーパーヒーローたちも！

eps.t: ギャング・オブ・シークレット
eps.ds: マリネットの友人たちがギャング・オブ・シークレットにアクマタイズされてしまう。スーパーヴィランの集まりは、本人が望もうと望むまいとマリネットを救おうとする！
ラミエル氏は72回目のアクマタイズをされてしまい、ミスター・ピジョンとなる。今度は人を悪いハトに変えてしまうのだ！
レディバグとシャノワールがよく知る人物と対戦することに…まさか戦うことになるとは、２人とも思ってもみなかった。

eps.t: ソール・クラッシャー
eps.ds: マリネットの仲間に新しく入った子が、人を吸い込めるスーパーヴィラン、ソール・クラッシャーにアクマタイズされてしまう。レディバグとシャノワールは立ち向かうことができるのだろうか？
クロエがクイーン・バナナにアクマタイズされる。スーパーヴィランを一緒に阻止するために、レディバグは前途有望な新しい仲間にミラキュラスを与えることにする。
リフレクタが底知れぬ罪悪感の深みにはまってしまう。レディバグは誰よりも楽観的な仲間に助けを求める。
シャドー・モスが恐ろしいスーパーヴィランを生み出し、もしマリネットとアドリアンがレディバグとシャノワールに変身できなかったら、果たしてどうなるのか？
シャドー・モスがセンチバブラーを創造する。それはリナルージュがレディバグとシャノワールを裏切らないと、攻撃を止めないという恐ろしいセンチモンスターだった。
ミラキュラスのガーディアンとして、レディバグは周囲の人々に影響を及ぼす難しい決断を迫られる。しかし誰もが彼女のように、永久的に隠れて暮らす心の準備はできていなかった。
マリネットが将来のことを考えていると、パリに新たなスーパーヴィランが現れる。ヴィランは人々の子供の頃の夢を強引にかなえていくが、我がヒーローたちにとっては悪夢のような存在であった。
マレディクテーターが、今度はセンチモンスターの支援を得て戻ってくる。レディバグは献身的な友人や味方にミラキュラスを与え、共にパリを救おうとする。
マリネットの親戚がアクマタイズされてしまい、複雑な世界を単純にしようとするスーパーヴィラン、シンプリフィケーターとなってしまう。レディバグとシャノワールにも簡単には止められない！

eps.t: ディアレスト・ファミリー
eps.ds: ガレット・デーはマリネットにとって大切な日！でもティッキーの様子がおかしいと思ったら、３人のスーパーヴィランが現れた。そのような状況の中、レディバグは女王になれるのだろうか？
マリネットが考えた計画を知り、シャドー・モスは２人のヴィランをアクマタイズする。レディバグとシャノワールは２人の悪事を阻止するために助けを求める。
レディバグとシャノワールがグラシエーターと再び対決。グラシエーターは、スーパーヒーローたちが恋をしてると主張し、レディバグをイラだたせる。シャノワールは、秘密の恋心を抱いているマリネットと出くわす。
シャドー・モスが新たなスーパーヴィランを生み出すと決断した日に、マリネットがパリの街から離れなければいけなかったら？

eps.t: ガブリエル・アグレスト
eps.ds: マリネットは夕食会の最中にアグレスト家に忍び込むが、スーパーヴィランもパーティーに押しかけていることがわかる。レディバグはこの夜会の事態を収められるのか？
レディバグとシャノワールが、互いの正体を知ったら一体どのように反応するのか？レディバグはガーディアンでいるために、シャノワールの正体を明かすべきか決めなければいけない。
有名なコメディアンがサイコメディアンにアクマタイズされてしまう。あらゆる感情を相手に与えることができる彼の狙いは、すべての人から笑顔を消し去ること。まずはレディバグとシャノワールから！
マリネットは自分の不注意で家族を恐ろしいスーパーヴィランのキリンにアクマタイズされてしまう。レディバグは恐れずに戦えるのだろうか？
もしシャノワールが辞めることにしてミラキュラスをレディバグに返すとしたら、代わりができるのは誰だろうか？
シャドー・モスのお気に入りが、恐ろしいスーパーヴィランのチームであるペナルチームにアクマタイズされてしまい、レディバグはスーパーヒーローたちを呼び出して立ち向かう。最強のチームが勝つことを祈ろう！

eps.t: リスク（シャドー・モスの最後の襲撃 - パート1）
eps.ds: レディバグとシャノワールの知らないうちに、シャドー・モスはしぶとく最後の襲撃を仕掛けてくる…。

eps.t: 反撃（シャドー・モスの最後の攻撃 パート２）
eps.ds: シャドー・モスの仕掛けた罠がレディバグとシャノワールに迫り来る。２人の運命は永遠に変わってしまうかもしれない。
レディバグとシャノワールは、これまでの戦いの中でラビット・ミラキュラスを手に入れた敵と対峙する。
何日もの間、パリを悩ませるようなアクマタイズされたヴィランはまったく現れない。もしかしてモナークはあきらめたのだろうか？
もしも、レディバグの最悪の悪夢が現実になったらどうしよう？もしも、モナークがマリネット・デュパン＝チェンの家に現れたら…モナークから逃れられるのだろうか？
モナークは、アクマタイズされたヴィランに人間の心の奥底の欲望を見せる力を与える。レディバグとシャノワールはこの危険な力から逃れられるだろうか？
学校の秘密のネットワークは、故意にアクマタイゼーションを引き起こすことによって、モナークの新しい力がどのように機能するかを見つけることを決意しています。てんとう虫とキャットノワールはそのような計画に同意しますか?
マリネットとアドリアンが自分たちの感情に思いを巡らせている間、レディバグとシャノワールは、ヴィランと17人のならず者たちと対決しなければならない。
２人の恋の行方のすべてがひっくり返ってしまうとしても、レディバグとシャノワールは無慈悲なヴィランから逃れるためにミラキュラスを交換しなければならない。
ルーブル美術館を訪れている間、マリネッテはティッキが誕生日に彼女に与えたクワガタマの秘密を発見します。
レディバグとシャノワールは再びグラシエーターと対決するが、ヒーローたちは身も凍るような発見をすることになる！

eps.t: トランスミッション（クワミの選択 - パート１ ）
eps.ds: ティッキーとプラッグは、レディバグとシャノワールが自分たちの気持ちを諦めなければならないのを残念に思いつつ、パリの多くのことを変えてしまうような選択をする。

eps.t: 爆燃（クワミたちの選択 - パート２）
eps.ds: 恋を諦めてしまった持ち主たちを気の毒だと思ったティッキーとプラッグは、良くも悪くもパリを変えてしまう大騒動を起こす。
マリネットの友達がアドリアンとの距離を縮める手助けをすることになり、友人にはいつもはっきりと物事を伝えるべきだとみんなが気付く。
有名人の息子ルカは、金もうけのためなら何でもするボブ・ロスに興味津々！ルカ自身も、自分の価値と友達を守るためなら何でもしようとする。
もしマリネットが抱える人間関係の悩みの原因が、彼女自身の過去にあるとしたら？みんなが知らないマリネットの過去を見てみよう。
ミラキュラスを手に入れる最後のチャンスを得られるかもしれないと知ったモナークは、あらゆることに対して準備を整える。
マリネッテとエイドリアンが近づくにつれて、リラは加賀美を操作するために彼女の才能を使用します。リラの有毒な嘘は、加賀美、マリネッテ、エイドリアンの友情を台無しにしますか?
マリネットとゾーイは、学期末のパーティーを仕切ることになる。だが、ふたりの敵が美しい友情を壊そうとする。
アドリアンは、父とツルギ夫人が企画したダンスに参加しなければならない。
マリネットは、大好きな男の子の父親ときちんと向き合おうと決心する。その勇気に励まされた友達のカガミは、ついに母親に話をしてみようと考える。
リラがマリネットのクラス委員の座を奪おうと投票を呼びかけるが、選挙運動では問題が続く。リラの主張は話半分に聞いたほうがいいかもしれない。
もうすぐ学校生活も終わる頃。リラとクロエは教師の前でクラスメートの将来を守らなければならない。ふたりの敵が何をたくらんでいるのか、マリネットは不安を覚える。
学期末が近づき、反逆が始まる。モナークは、自分の正体だけでなくレディバグとシャノワールにとっても危険な計画の実行を決める。
クロエとモナークが、さらにパワーを強める。レディバグとシャノワールは、自分たちのパワーに疑問を抱く。マリネットとアドリアンの未来も一変しようとしている。
マリネットは、思いがけない秘密を知る。

eps.t: 適合（最後の日 - パート１）
eps.ds: モナークは自身の邪悪な計画の最後のピースをはめようとする。絶望的な状況に直面するレディバグとシャノワール。ついにモナークが勝利してしまうのだろうか？

eps.t: 再創造（最後の日 - パート２）
eps.ds: モナークの究極の計画が進行し、誰にも止められない。世界が混沌に陥る中、レディバグは捕らわれてしまう。
マリネットたちがパリでプラスチックの汚染に対抗しようとしている時、ヒーローたちはスーパーヴィランよりも恐ろしい意外な敵に遭遇する。

Bir çocuk kanalı yarışmasının kaybedeni Hawk Moth tarafından akumalanır. Artık Fırtınalı Hava olan HawkMoth, ona oy vermeyen herkesten intikam alır. Süper kahramanlarımız için önümüzde karanlık birgök
Nino, Adrien'in babasını, en iyi arkadaşı için doğum günü partisi vermeye ikna edemediği için büyük hayal kırıklığına uğrar. Şahin Güvesi tarafından akumalanan ve Baloncu'ya dönüşüp, yetişkinleri yok
Marinette'in öğrencilerinden biri Hawk Moth tarafından akumalanıyor. Artık Timebreaker olan Alix,  sınıf arkadaşları tarafından kalbi kırılmış bir şekilde saatini kurtarmak için zamanda geriye gitmek

Genç bir Mısır bilimci olan Celil, Hawk Moth tarafından akumalanır. Firavun'a dönüşen Celil, Alya'yı bir törenle kurban etmek ister! Uğur böceği ve Kara Kedi onu durdurmak istiyorsa, mumyalara karşı s

Marinette'in en iyi arkadaşı Alya, Hawk Moth tarafından akumalanır. Artık Leydi Wifi olan Alya, Chloe'nin Uğur Böceği olduğuna ikna olur ve maskesini düşürmeye çalışır. Uğur böceği ne pahasına olursa

Manon yine Kuklacı'ya dönüşür ve  benzersiz bir oyun bahçesi olan Grevin Balmumu Müzesinde çok eğlenmeye kararlıdır. Onu durdurmak istiyorlarsa, Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi öylece duramazlar.

Marinette tarafından düşünülen bir plan nedeniyle Gölge Moth iki süper kötüyü akumalar. Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi, bu kötü ikiliyi durdurabilmek için yardıma ihtiyaç duyar.

Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi, Buzatör'le yeniden karşı karşıya. Buzatör, Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi'nin birbirine aşık olduğunu söylemekte ısrar eder ve Uğur Böceği'ni sinirlendirir. Kara Kedi, gizli aşkıyl
Ya Marinette'in, Shadow Moth'un yeni bir süper kötü yaratmaya karar verdiği gün Paris'i terk etmekten başka seçeneği yoksa?

Agreste evinde özel bir akşam yemeği verilirken Marinette, yemeğe bir süper kötünün katılıp katılmadığını anlamak için gizlice eve girer. Acaba Marinette günü kurtarabilecek midir? Ya da, akşam yemeği
Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi birbirinin gizli kimliğini öğrenseydi ne olurdu? Uğur böceği, Gardiyan kalabilmek için Kara Kedi'nin kim olduğunu açıklamak ya da açıklamamak konusunda bir karara varmalıdır.
Ünlü bir komedyen akumalanır ve Psikomedyen'e dönüşür. Herkese her türlü duyguyu yükleyebilir ve herkesin yüzündeki gülümsemeyi silmek ister... Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi ile başlayarak!
Marinette'in dikkatsizliği sonucu yaptığı bir hata yüzünden en yakın akrabalarından biri akumalanır ve dehşet saçan kötü Qilin'e dönüşür. Uğur Böceği onunla savaşmaya cesaret edecek mi?
Kara Kedi istifa etmeye ve Mucize'sini Uğur Böceği'ne geri vermeye karar verirse onun yerini kim alabilir?
Shadow Moth'un en sevdiği kurbanlarından biri akumatize olup korkunç bir süper kötüler takımı olan Penalteam'e katılınca, Uğur Böceği onunla yüzleşmesi için kendi süper kahramanlarını çağırır.
Gölge Moth, Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi'nin haberi olmadan sabırla planladığı son saldırıyı uygulamaya başlar...
Shadow Moth'un tuzağı Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi'nin üzerine kapanır ve kaderlerini sonsuza dek alt üst etmekle tehdit eder...
Ladybug ve Cat Noir, zamana ve önceki maceralarına karşı yarışta artık Tavşan Miraculous'a sahip olan bir düşmanla karşı karşıyadır.
Günler geçerken, tek bir akumalaştırılmış kötü kahraman bile Paris'e zulmetmek için ortaya çıkmaz. Monarşi pes etmiş olabilir mi?
Ya Ladybug'ın en kötü kâbusu gerçekleşirse? Ya Monarch, Marinette Dupain-Cheng'in evinde ortaya çıkarsa? Ondan kaçabilecek midir?
Kral, insanlara en derin arzularını gösteren şölenin gücünü akumatize edilmiş bir kötü adama emanet eder. Uğur Böceği ile Kara Kedi bu tehlikeli güçten kurtulabilecek mi?
Marinette ve Adrien duygularını merak ederken, Uğur Böceği ile Kara Kedi bir kötü adam ve onun 17 yardımcısıyla yüzleşir!
Aşk hayatlarında her şey alt üst olurken, Uğur Böceği ile Kara Kedi, acımasız bir kötü adamdan kaçmak için mucizelerini değiştirmek zorunda kalırlar.
Louvre müzesini ziyaret ederken Marinette, tikki'nin doğum gününde ona verdiği kwagatamanın sırlarını keşfeder.
Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi bir kez daha Buzatör ile karşı karşıya geliyor. Kahramanlarımız kan dondurucu bir şey öğrenecek!
Marinette'in arkadaşları onun Adrien ile yakınlaşmasına yardım etmeye karar verdiğinde, tüm ekip, birinin her zaman arkadaşlarına her şeyi açıkça söylemesi gerektiğini öğrenir.
Para kazanmak için her şeyi yapan Bob Roth, bir ünlünün oğlu olan Luka'nın özel olarak ilgisini çeker! Ama Luka değerlerini ve dostlarını korumak için her şeyi yapar.
Ya Marinette'in ilişki sorunlarının çözümü geçmişinde yatıyorsa? Ta bugün bildiğimiz Marinette olmadığı günlerde...
Monarch, gerçek bir ikinci şans elde etmek için nadir bir fırsat yakaladığını sezer ve bunun için her şeyi yapmaya hazırdır. Bu, Mucize’yi yakalamak için son şansı olsa bile.
Marinette ve Adrien yakınlaştıkça, Lila yeteneğini Kagami'yi manipüle etmek için kullanır. Lila'nın zehirli yalanları Kagami, Marinette ve Adrien arasındaki dostluğu mahvedecek mi?
Adrien, babası ve Bayan Tsurugi tarafından düzenlenen bir dansa katılmak zorundadır.
Marinette sevdiği çocuğun babasıyla samimi bir konuşma yapmaya karar verir. Onun cesur tavrı, sonunda annesiyle konuşmaya cesaret eden arkadaşı Kagami'ye ilham verir...
Lila, Marinette'in yerine sınıf başkanı olmak için yeni bir seçim çağrısı yapınca kampanya ters gider. Dikkat, çünkü Lila söz konusu olduğunda işler çoğu zaman göründüğü gibi değildir...
Ortaokul yakında sona erecektir ve Lila ile Chloe sınıf arkadaşlarının geleceğini öğretmenlerinin önünde savunmak zorundadır. Marinette endişelidir: İki veledin bir sonraki şeytani planı acaba nedir?
Chloe ve Monarch her zamankinden daha güçlüdür. Uğur Böceği ve Kara Kedi güçlerini merak eder. Marinette ve Adrien'ın hayatları ise sonsuza dek değişmek üzeredir.
Marinette ve dostları Paris'ta plastik kirliliği ile aktif şekilde savaşırken kahramanlarımız sıradan giyimli bir rakiple karşılaşır, üstelik bazı süper kahramanlardan daha korkutucudur.

Max gets akumatized by Hawk Moth again. Now Gamer 2.0, he captures all the former akumatized villains and challenges Ladybug and Cat Noir to free them by playing against him.
Aurore Boreale gets akumatized again. Now Stormy Weather 2, she plunges Earth into a never-ending winter. Ladybug & Cat Noir will have to keep their cool if they want to stop her!
Kagami’s mother gets akumatized into Ikari Gozen. Armed with her bokken, she wants to punish Kagami for disobeying her, and to lock her up forever in giant armour.
Ladybug and Cat Noir face Timetagger, a supervillain who has come from the future to seize their Miraculous. The future of Paris lies in their hands!

Manon becomes The Puppeteer again. And she is determined to have fun like never before in a unique playground: the Grévin wax museum! Ladybug and Cat Noir cannot stand still if they want to stop her!
When Marinette makes a serious mistake, she has to face the consequences by fighting the last person she ever imagined would get akumatized…

When Adrien’s cousin Felix sows discord between Adrien and his friends, Alya, Rose and Juleka get akumatized into the Punishers Trio. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to stop the three villains and re
Lila manipulates all Marinette’s close ones, who turn against her, but an even bigger problem awaits Marinette: she is going to have to face a sentimonster that has taken the appearance of… Ladybug!

Ladybug and Cat Noir face the Bourgeois couple. Now Hearthunter, a Cerberus with
two heads, they devour all the love in Paris. Will our heroes manage to save love?
Hawk Moth akumatizes Chloe into Miracle Queen to help her take control of all the Miraculous wearers. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that fatal plan?
Nino’s little brother gets akumatized into Chris Master & sends giant toys out to wreak havoc in snowy Paris, looking for Santa Claus.
A friend of Marinette's gets akumatized into Truth. Using his power to force people to tell the truth, he wants to know Marinette's secret...and Ladybug and Cat Noir's, too!
A friend of Adrien's get akumatized into Lies. Able to make liars disappear, she is determined to rid the world of lies and those who tell them...including superheroes!
Marinette's friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her...whether she wants it or not!
Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into Mr. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons!
Ladybug and Cat Noir face someone they know well...and never imagined they would have to fight someday.
A newcomer to Marinette's circle of friends gets akumatized into Sole Crusher, a giant supervillain who can absorb people. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir be up to the task?
When Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Banana, Ladybug decides to entrust a Miraculous to a new and promising ally to help her stop the supervillain.
When Reflekta locks herself into a bottomless abyss of guilt, Ladybug calls on an ally with unfailing optimism.
What would happen if Shadow Moth created a fearsome supervillain while Marinette and Adrien couldn't transform into Ladybug and Cat Noir?
Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir!
As Guardian of Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions that affect the people around her. But not everyone is ready to live in permanent hiding like her...
As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to force people to live their childlhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes.
When Malediktator comes back, now seconded by a Sentimonster, Ladybug entrusts a committed friend and ally with a Miraculous to help her save Paris.
Ladybug and Cat Noir face an opponent who is now in possession of the Rabbit Miraculous in a race through time…and their previous adventures.
As the days go by, not a single akumatized villain shows up to torment Paris. Could Monarch possibly have given up?
What if Ladybug’s worst nightmare came true? What if Monarch showed up at Marinette Dupain-Cheng’s home?…Would she be able to escape him?
Monarch entrusts an akumatized villain with the power of Jubilation, which shows people their deepest desires. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that dangerous power?
A secret network at school is determined to find out how Monarch’s new power works by deliberately triggering an akumatization. Would Ladybug and Cat Noir agree with such a plan?
While Marinette and Adrien wonder about their feelings, Ladybug and Cat Noir face a villain…and her 17 goons!
As everything turns upside down in their love lives, Ladybug and Cat Noir must exchange their Miraculous to escape a ruthless villain.
While visiting the Louvre museum, Marinette discovers the secrets of the kwagatama that Tikki gave her on her birthday.
As Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again, our heroes don’t know that they are about to make a chilling discovery!
Sorry to see their holders so sad to have to give up on their feelings, Tikki and Plagg make a drastic choice that will change many a thing in Paris…
Sorry to see their holders unlucky in love, Tikki and Plagg have made a drastic noise which is changing many a thing in Paris…for better and for worse.
When Marinette’s friends decide to help her get closer to Adrien, the whole gang finds out that one should always tell friends things clearly.
As the son of a celebrity, Luka piques special interest in Bob Roth, who would do anything to make money! But Luka himself would do anything to defend his values and his friends.
What if the answer to Marinette’s relationship problems lay in her own past? Back when she wasn’t the Marinette we know today....
When Monarch senses a unique occasion to get a real second chance, he is ready to do anything, even if it means that this could be his last chance to seize the Miraculous.
As Marinette and Adrien grow closer, Lila uses her talent for manipulation on Kagami. Will Lila’s poisonous lies ruin the friendship between Kagami, Marinette and Adrien?
When Marinette and Zoe are chosen to organize the end-of-school-year party, a common enemy of the girls tries to ruin their beautiful friendship.
Adrien must attend a dance organized by his father and Mrs. Tsurugi.
Marinette decides to have a heart-to-heart with the father of the boy she loves. Her courage inspires her friend Kagami, who finally dares talk to her mother.…
When Lila calls for new elections to replace Marinette as class representative, the campaign goes wrong. Watch out, for with Lila, things are more often not what they seem….
Junior high will soon be over, and Lila and Chloe must defend their classmates’ future before their teachers. Marinette worries: What will be the two brats’ next evil plan?
The end of the school year is near, and rebellion is brewing. Monarch decides to implement a plan that is dangerous for his secret identity…and for Ladybug and Cat Noir, too.
Chloe and Monarch are more powerful than ever. Ladybug and Cat Noir wonder about their powers. And Marinette and Adrien’s lives are about to change forever.
Marinette discovers a secret nothing could have prepared her for.
Monarch has just placed the final pieces of his villainous plan on his chessboard of evil. Are Ladybug and Cat Noir doomed? Will Monarch win in the end?
Monarch’s ultimate plan is in motion, with nothing seeming to stop him now: Ladybug has been trapped in person while the world descends into chaos.
As Marinette and her friends want to actively fight plastic pollution in Paris, our heroes will meet an opponent in plain clothes, more fearsome than even some supervillains.
Ladybug and her team face a villain full of imagination.
Adrien has made a new friend whom Marinette is determined to befriend, too. But Marinette has no clue how to become friends with someone who doesn’t need to be helped.
To celebrate her hundredth kiss with Adrien, Marinette has planned a romantic evening — forgetting that she’d already planned a movie night with her girlfriends at the same time!
When Adrien gets nervous about meeting his grandparents, Marinette gatecrashes the lunch to support him...unaware that a family war is about to break out.
Marinette and Adrien are now the most famous couple in Paris. As such, they catch the attention of an unscrupulous influencer who will do anything to generate buzz….
Ladybug and Cat Noir face a villain determined to steal their thunder. Will the superheroes weather the storm?
While Ivan faces a difficult family situation, Marinette finds a letter addressed to Adrien...from his father.
While trying desperately to hide her seasonal cold from Adrien, Marinette tries to help Nathaniel assert himself so he can illustrate the comic Marc wrote for him.

Max gets akumatized by Hawk Moth again. Now Gamer 2.0, he captures all the former akumatized villains and challenges Ladybug and Cat Noir to free them by playing against him.
Aurore Boreale gets akumatized again. Now Stormy Weather 2, she plunges Earth into a never-ending winter. Ladybug & Cat Noir will have to keep their cool if they want to stop her!
Kagami’s mother gets akumatized into Ikari Gozen. Armed with her bokken, she wants to punish Kagami for disobeying her, and to lock her up forever in giant armour.
Ladybug and Cat Noir face Timetagger, a supervillain who has come from the future to seize their Miraculous. The future of Paris lies in their hands!

When Marinette makes a serious mistake, she has to face the consequences by fighting the last person she ever imagined would get akumatized…

When Adrien’s cousin Felix sows discord between Adrien and his friends, Alya, Rose and Juleka get akumatized into the Punishers Trio. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to stop the three villains and re
Lila manipulates all Marinette’s close ones, who turn against her, but an even bigger problem awaits Marinette: she is going to have to face a sentimonster that has taken the appearance of… Ladybug!

Ladybug and Cat Noir face the Bourgeois couple. Now Hearthunter, a Cerberus with
two heads, they devour all the love in Paris. Will our heroes manage to save love?
Hawk Moth akumatizes Chloe into Miracle Queen to help her take control of all the Miraculous wearers. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that fatal plan?
Nino’s little brother gets akumatized into Chris Master & sends giant toys out to wreak havoc in snowy Paris, looking for Santa Claus.
A friend of Marinette's gets akumatized into Truth. Using his power to force people to tell the truth, he wants to know Marinette's secret...and Ladybug and Cat Noir's, too!
A friend of Adrien's get akumatized into Lies. Able to make liars disappear, she is determined to rid the world of lies and those who tell them...including superheroes!
Marinette's friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her...whether she wants it or not!
Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into Mr. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons!
Ladybug and Cat Noir face someone they know well...and never imagined they would have to fight someday.
A newcomer to Marinette's circle of friends gets akumatized into Sole Crusher, a giant supervillain who can absorb people. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir be up to the task?
When Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Banana, Ladybug decides to entrust a Miraculous to a new and promising ally to help her stop the supervillain.
When Reflekta locks herself into a bottomless abyss of guilt, Ladybug calls on an ally with unfailing optimism.
What would happen if Shadow Moth created a fearsome supervillain while Marinette and Adrien couldn't transform into Ladybug and Cat Noir?
Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir!
As Guardian of Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions that affect the people around her. But not everyone is ready to live in permanent hiding like her...
As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to force people to live their childlhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes.
When Malediktator comes back, now seconded by a Sentimonster, Ladybug entrusts a committed friend and ally with a Miraculous to help her save Paris.
A relative of Marinette’s is akumatized into Simplificator, a supervillain determined to simplify this overly complex world. Stopping him won’t be simple for Ladybug and Cat Noir!
Galette Day is eventful for Marinette! Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! Will Ladybug still manage to establish herself as queen of the day?
Because of a plan thought up by Marinette, Shadow Moth akumatizes two villains. Ladybug and Cat Noir will need help to stop the evil duo.
Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again. Glaciator annoys Ladybug by insisting that the superheroes are in love. Cat Noir encounters Marinette, who wrestles with secret romance.
What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain?
Marinette sneaks into the Agreste home during a private dinner, only to find that a supervillain is also crashing the party. Will Ladybug save the day, or rather, the soirée?
What if Ladybug and Cat Noir found out about each other's secret identities? Ladybug must decide whether she should reveal Cat Noir's identity so that she can remain the Guardian.
A famous comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off everyone’s faces...starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir!
Because of one of Marinette's careless mistakes, one of her closest relatives is akumatized into Qilin, a fearsome supervillain. Will Ladybug dare to fight her?
If Cat Noir decided to quit and give his Miraculous back to Ladybug, who could possibly replace him?
When one of Shadow Moth's favorite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superheroes to face her. May the best team win!
Without Ladybug and Cat Noir knowing, Shadow Moth patiently sets his final attack in motion...
Shadow Moth's trap closes in on Ladybug and Cat Noir, threatening to turn their fate upside down forever...
Ladybug and Cat Noir face an opponent who is now in possession of the Rabbit Miraculous in a race through time…and their previous adventures.
As the days go by, not a single akumatized villain shows up to torment Paris. Could Monarch possibly have given up?
What if Ladybug’s worst nightmare came true? What if Monarch showed up at Marinette Dupain-Cheng’s home?…Would she be able to escape him?
Monarch entrusts an akumatized villain with the power of Jubilation, which shows people their deepest desires. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that dangerous power?
A secret network at school is determined to find out how Monarch’s new power works by deliberately triggering an akumatization. Would Ladybug and Cat Noir agree with such a plan?
While Marinette and Adrien wonder about their feelings, Ladybug and Cat Noir face a villain…and her 17 goons!
As everything turns upside down in their love lives, Ladybug and Cat Noir must exchange their Miraculous to escape a ruthless villain.
While visiting the Louvre museum, Marinette discovers the secrets of the kwagatama that Tikki gave her on her birthday.
As Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again, our heroes don’t know that they are about to make a chilling discovery!
Sorry to see their holders so sad to have to give up on their feelings, Tikki and Plagg make a drastic choice that will change many a thing in Paris…
Sorry to see their holders unlucky in love, Tikki and Plagg have made a drastic noise which is changing many a thing in Paris…for better and for worse.
When Marinette’s friends decide to help her get closer to Adrien, the whole gang finds out that one should always tell friends things clearly.
As the son of a celebrity, Luka piques special interest in Bob Roth, who would do anything to make money! But Luka himself would do anything to defend his values and his friends.
What if the answer to Marinette’s relationship problems lay in her own past? Back when she wasn’t the Marinette we know today....
When Monarch senses a unique occasion to get a real second chance, he is ready to do anything, even if it means that this could be his last chance to seize the Miraculous.
As Marinette and Adrien grow closer, Lila uses her talent for manipulation on Kagami. Will Lila’s poisonous lies ruin the friendship between Kagami, Marinette and Adrien?
When Marinette and Zoe are chosen to organize the end-of-school-year party, a common enemy of the girls tries to ruin their beautiful friendship.
Adrien must attend a dance organized by his father and Mrs. Tsurugi.
Marinette decides to have a heart-to-heart with the father of the boy she loves. Her courage inspires her friend Kagami, who finally dares talk to her mother.…
When Lila calls for new elections to replace Marinette as class representative, the campaign goes wrong. Watch out, for with Lila, things are more often not what they seem….
Junior high will soon be over, and Lila and Chloe must defend their classmates’ future before their teachers. Marinette worries: What will be the two brats’ next evil plan?
The end of the school year is near, and rebellion is brewing. Monarch decides to implement a plan that is dangerous for his secret identity…and for Ladybug and Cat Noir, too.
Chloe and Monarch are more powerful than ever. Ladybug and Cat Noir wonder about their powers. And Marinette and Adrien’s lives are about to change forever.
Marinette discovers a secret nothing could have prepared her for.
Monarch has just placed the final pieces of his villainous plan on his chessboard of evil. Are Ladybug and Cat Noir doomed? Will Monarch win in the end?
Monarch’s ultimate plan is in motion, with nothing seeming to stop him now: Ladybug has been trapped in person while the world descends into chaos.

Marinette’s grandfather gets akumatized into Bakerix. Gifted with super strength, he wants to destroy everything too modern. Will Ladybug &  Cat Noir defeat that tough cookie?

An old friend of Master Fu’s, Marianne, gets akumatized into Backwarder. Armed with
a magic wand, she wants to make up for lost time by stealing it from others! There’s
not a second to lose for Ladybu

Juleka becomes Reflekta again. But this time, the supervillain is not alone... and Marinette and Adrien are having trouble with their Miraculous. Will our heroes manage to stop Reflekta and her fearso
Tom gets akumatized into Weredad, a huge, monstrous guard dog-man who locks Marinette up in a magic prison to protect her from the outside world. Will Marinette manage to stop her own father?
Luka gets akumatized into Silencer & steals voices to get revenge on a music producer who did Marinette wrong. Ladybug & Cat Noir will have to raise their voices to stop him!
Kagami gets akumatized into Oni-Chan. Armed with a magic mask, she wants to keep Lila away from Adrien… for good. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to reason with her?
Sabrina gets akumatized by Hawk Moth. Now Miraculer, she can steal powers from superheroes & is determined to show Chloe that she is just as worthy of her interest as Ladybug.
Ladybug and Cat Noir have lost their memory, and a mysterious villain is prowling around Paris. Will our heroes manage to defeat Oblivio and turn him into just a bad memory?
Jagged Stone’s guitarist Vivica gets akumatized into Desperada. Armed with her evil guitar, she wants to punish Jagged Stone for firing her. Ladybug and Cat Noir had better be ready to rock on!
Max’s mom gets akumatized into Startrain. Now at the controls of a flying train, she wants to realize her dream of becoming an astronaut. High-flying mission ahead for Ladybug and Cat Noir!

Mrs. Mendeleiev gets akumatized into Kwamibuster. She wants to capture Tikki and Plagg to prove to the world that these magic creatures are real! Ladybug and Cat Noir will have to protect their secret

When Master Fu’s past comes back to haunt him, he takes Marinette and Adrien’s Miraculous back to protect them. But they are ready for anything to defend him, even if it means facing a sentimonster wi
Max gets akumatized by Hawk Moth again. Now Gamer 2.0, he captures all the former akumatized villains and challenges Ladybug and Cat Noir to free them by playing against him.
Aurore Boreale gets akumatized again. Now Stormy Weather 2, she plunges Earth into a never-ending winter. Ladybug & Cat Noir will have to keep their cool if they want to stop her!
Kagami’s mother gets akumatized into Ikari Gozen. Armed with her bokken, she wants to punish Kagami for disobeying her, and to lock her up forever in giant armour.
Ladybug and Cat Noir face Timetagger, a supervillain who has come from the future to seize their Miraculous. The future of Paris lies in their hands!

Because of a misunderstanding, a fan of Adrien’s gets akumatized into Party Crasher. Convinced that his star has made a fool of him, he is determined to get revenge. Will Ladybug and her team manage t
Manon becomes The Puppeteer again. And she is determined to have fun like never before in a unique playground: the Grévin wax museum! Ladybug and Cat Noir cannot stand still if they want to stop her!
When Marinette makes a serious mistake, she has to face the consequences by fighting the last person she ever imagined would get akumatized…

When Adrien’s cousin Felix sows discord between Adrien and his friends, Alya, Rose and Juleka get akumatized into the Punishers Trio. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to stop the three villains and re
Lila manipulates all Marinette’s close ones, who turn against her, but an even bigger problem awaits Marinette: she is going to have to face a sentimonster that has taken the appearance of… Ladybug!

Ladybug and Cat Noir face the Bourgeois couple. Now Hearthunter, a Cerberus with
two heads, they devour all the love in Paris. Will our heroes manage to save love?
Hawk Moth akumatizes Chloe into Miracle Queen to help her take control of all the Miraculous wearers. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that fatal plan?
Nino’s little brother gets akumatized into Chris Master & sends giant toys out to wreak havoc in snowy Paris, looking for Santa Claus.
A friend of Marinette's gets akumatized into Truth. Using his power to force people to tell the truth, he wants to know Marinette's secret...and Ladybug and Cat Noir's, too!
A friend of Adrien's get akumatized into Lies. Able to make liars disappear, she is determined to rid the world of lies and those who tell them...including superheroes!
Marinette's friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her...whether she wants it or not!
Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into Mr. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons!
Ladybug and Cat Noir face someone they know well...and never imagined they would have to fight someday.
A newcomer to Marinette's circle of friends gets akumatized into Sole Crusher, a giant supervillain who can absorb people. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir be up to the task?
When Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Banana, Ladybug decides to entrust a Miraculous to a new and promising ally to help her stop the supervillain.
When Reflekta locks herself into a bottomless abyss of guilt, Ladybug calls on an ally with unfailing optimism.
What would happen if Shadow Moth created a fearsome supervillain while Marinette and Adrien couldn't transform into Ladybug and Cat Noir?
Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir!
As Guardian of Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions that affect the people around her. But not everyone is ready to live in permanent hiding like her...
As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to force people to live their childlhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes.
When Malediktator comes back, now seconded by a Sentimonster, Ladybug entrusts a committed friend and ally with a Miraculous to help her save Paris.
A relative of Marinette’s is akumatized into Simplificator, a supervillain determined to simplify this overly complex world. Stopping him won’t be simple for Ladybug and Cat Noir!
Galette Day is eventful for Marinette! Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! Will Ladybug still manage to establish herself as queen of the day?
Because of a plan thought up by Marinette, Shadow Moth akumatizes two villains. Ladybug and Cat Noir will need help to stop the evil duo.
Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again. Glaciator annoys Ladybug by insisting that the superheroes are in love. Cat Noir encounters Marinette, who wrestles with secret romance.
What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain?
Marinette sneaks into the Agreste home during a private dinner, only to find that a supervillain is also crashing the party. Will Ladybug save the day, or rather, the soirée?
What if Ladybug and Cat Noir found out about each other's secret identities? Ladybug must decide whether she should reveal Cat Noir's identity so that she can remain the Guardian.
A famous comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off everyone’s faces...starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir!
Because of one of Marinette's careless mistakes, one of her closest relatives is akumatized into Qilin, a fearsome supervillain. Will Ladybug dare to fight her?
If Cat Noir decided to quit and give his Miraculous back to Ladybug, who could possibly replace him?
When one of Shadow Moth's favorite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superheroes to face her. May the best team win!
Without Ladybug and Cat Noir knowing, Shadow Moth patiently sets his final attack in motion...
Shadow Moth's trap closes in on Ladybug and Cat Noir, threatening to turn their fate upside down forever...
Ladybug and Cat Noir face an opponent who is now in possession of the Rabbit Miraculous in a race through time…and their previous adventures.
As the days go by, not a single akumatized villain shows up to torment Paris. Could Monarch possibly have given up?
What if Ladybug’s worst nightmare came true? What if Monarch showed up at Marinette Dupain-Cheng’s home?…Would she be able to escape him?
Monarch entrusts an akumatized villain with the power of Jubilation, which shows people their deepest desires. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that dangerous power?
A secret network at school is determined to find out how Monarch’s new power works by deliberately triggering an akumatization. Would Ladybug and Cat Noir agree with such a plan?
While Marinette and Adrien wonder about their feelings, Ladybug and Cat Noir face a villain…and her 17 goons!
As everything turns upside down in their love lives, Ladybug and Cat Noir must exchange their Miraculous to escape a ruthless villain.
While visiting the Louvre museum, Marinette discovers the secrets of the kwagatama that Tikki gave her on her birthday.
As Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again, our heroes don’t know that they are about to make a chilling discovery!
Sorry to see their holders so sad to have to give up on their feelings, Tikki and Plagg make a drastic choice that will change many a thing in Paris…
Sorry to see their holders unlucky in love, Tikki and Plagg have made a drastic noise which is changing many a thing in Paris…for better and for worse.
When Marinette’s friends decide to help her get closer to Adrien, the whole gang finds out that one should always tell friends things clearly.
As the son of a celebrity, Luka piques special interest in Bob Roth, who would do anything to make money! But Luka himself would do anything to defend his values and his friends.
What if the answer to Marinette’s relationship problems lay in her own past? Back when she wasn’t the Marinette we know today....
When Monarch senses a unique occasion to get a real second chance, he is ready to do anything, even if it means that this could be his last chance to seize the Miraculous.
As Marinette and Adrien grow closer, Lila uses her talent for manipulation on Kagami. Will Lila’s poisonous lies ruin the friendship between Kagami, Marinette and Adrien?
When Marinette and Zoe are chosen to organize the end-of-school-year party, a common enemy of the girls tries to ruin their beautiful friendship.
Adrien must attend a dance organized by his father and Mrs. Tsurugi.
Marinette decides to have a heart-to-heart with the father of the boy she loves. Her courage inspires her friend Kagami, who finally dares talk to her mother.…
When Lila calls for new elections to replace Marinette as class representative, the campaign goes wrong. Watch out, for with Lila, things are more often not what they seem….
Junior high will soon be over, and Lila and Chloe must defend their classmates’ future before their teachers. Marinette worries: What will be the two brats’ next evil plan?
The end of the school year is near, and rebellion is brewing. Monarch decides to implement a plan that is dangerous for his secret identity…and for Ladybug and Cat Noir, too.
Chloe and Monarch are more powerful than ever. Ladybug and Cat Noir wonder about their powers. And Marinette and Adrien’s lives are about to change forever.
Marinette discovers a secret nothing could have prepared her for.
Monarch has just placed the final pieces of his villainous plan on his chessboard of evil. Are Ladybug and Cat Noir doomed? Will Monarch win in the end?
Monarch’s ultimate plan is in motion, with nothing seeming to stop him now: Ladybug has been trapped in person while the world descends into chaos.
As Marinette and her friends want to actively fight plastic pollution in Paris, our heroes will meet an opponent in plain clothes, more fearsome than even some supervillains.
De verliezer van een wedstrijd krijgt een Akuma van Havikmot. Lekker Weertje neemt wraak op iedereen die niet op haar gestemd heeft. Het ziet er somber uit voor onze helden.

Nino overtuigt Adrien's vader niet een feestje te geven voor zijn beste vriend. Teleurgesteld krijgt hij een akuma van Havikmot. De Bellenman laat volwassenen verdwijnen. Kunnen Ladybug en Cat ontsnap

Een medestudent van Marinette krijgt een akuma van Havikmot. Tijdbreker wil terug in de tijd om haar horloge, per ongeluk gesloopt door haar klasgenoten, te redden. Ladybug heeft geen tijd te verlieze

Jalil, een jonge Egyptoloog krijgt een akuma van Havikmot. Farao wil Alya offeren in een ritueel. Als Ladybug en Cat Noir hem hem willen stoppen, moeten ze de strijd aan gaan met mummies en oude gehei
Meneer Ramier is een duivenliefhebber. Door de akuma van Havikmot wordt hij Meneer Duif en wil hij Parijs in een duivenkoninkrijk veranderen. Om hem te stoppen moeten onze helden aan de bak.
Marinette's beste vriend Alya krijgt een akuma van Havikmot. Lady Wifi is ervan overtuigd dat Chloe Ladybug is en wil haar ontmaskeren. Ladybug moet haar geheime identiteit beschermen.
Een medestudent van Marinette krijgt een akuma van Havikmot. De Onheillustrator zoekt wraak op Chloe, de bullebak die hem uitlachte. Onze helden moeten creatief zijn om haar te redden.
Sabrina's vader, een politieagent, krijgt een akuma van Havikmoet. Rogercop heerst met harde hand in Parijs. Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten bewijzen dat zij de echte helden zijn.
Vernedert tijdens de productie van een film, krijgt Mylene een akuma van Havikmot en verandert in Horrificator, een vreselijk monster. Wie is er bang van het monster? Niet Ladydbug en Cat Noir.

Afgewezen door Chloe, krijgt Kim een akuma en verandert in Duistere Cupido. Gewapend met een boog en scherpe rozen, wil de zwarte engel liefde veranderen in haat. Ladybug en Cat moeten een hoop gebrok
Ieder verhaal heeft een einde. Zie hoe Marinette en Adrien, twee doodgewone middelbare scholieren, Ladybug en Cat Noir geworden zijn en waarom Havikmot hun Miraculous wil hebben.
Marinette's zelfvertrouwen is laag en ze wil Ladybug niet meer zijn. De stad, Cat Noir en haar beste vriend Alya zijn echter in gevaar en Ladybug is de enige die hen kan redden.
Een beeldhouwer die verliefd is op Ladybug en jaloers op Cat, krijgt een akuma van Havikmot. Cat's nare tweelingbroer Imitator wil van onze held af om Ladybug voor zichzelf te hebben.
Verraden door een partner, krijgt Fred Haprele een akuma en verandert in de Mimespeler. Wat hij ook uitbeeldt komt tot leven en hij wil zijn woede botvieren. Ladybug en Cat moeten snel zijn om hem te
Een medestudent van Marinette krijgt een akuma van Havikmot. Prinses Parfum wil een prins ontvoeren die Parijs bezoekt. Deze nieuwe schurk ruikt naar problemen voor Ladybug en Cat Noir.

Na de verkiezingen te hebben verloren, krijgt Armand d'Argencourt een akuma. Als Darkblade en gewapend met zijn zwaard, wil hij alsnog burgemeester worden.  Ladybug en Cat moeten de degens met hem kru

Nadat hij door Kim vernederd is, krijgt Otis de dierenverzorger een akuma en verandert hij in een zwarte panter. Als Dierman richt hij vernielingen aan. Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten hem in het wild zien
Nadat de hypnotiseur Jacques Grimault door Gabriel Ageste vernederd is, krijgt hij een akuma. Als Simon Zegtkan hij mensen hem laten gehoorzamen. Simon Zegt; vernietig Ladybug en Cat Noir!
Vincent Asa is een fan van rockster Jagged Stone. Hij krijgt een akuma van Havikmot en verandert in Pixelmaker en is van plan ook een rockster te worden. Ladybug en Cat Noir spelen echter geen tweede

Jagged Stone krijgt een akuma. Als Gitaarschurk, de hardst rockende schurk aller tijden, zoekt hij wraak op een jonge en arrogante popzanger. Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten een toontje hoger zingen om hem

Nadat Max vanwege Marinette gediskwalificeerd is bij een game toernooi, krijgt hij een akuma. Als de Gamer controleert hij een robot die grote schade aanricht in Parijs. Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten hem
Afwezig op de klassenfoto's dankzij Chloe, krijgt Julenka een akuma. Als Reflecta verandert ze iedereen in kopietjes van haarzelf, inclusief Cat! Er is één persoon die haar kan stoppen: Ladybug!
Onterecht beschuldigd van diefstal, krijgt Chloe een akuma. Ladybug moet vechten met een tegenstander met dezelfde krachten als zij.. Zal het haar deze keer lukken?
Na een ruzie met Ladybug, krijgt Chloe een akuma en verandert in Antibug. Ladybug moet tegen een tegenstander vechten met dezelfde krachten als zij.. Zal ze het deze keer redden?

Nadat hij door Chloe vernederd werd tijdens een kookwedstrijd, krijgt Marinette's oom een akuma en verandert hij in Kung Voedsel. Iedereen die zijn eten proeft komt in zijn macht. Hem tegenhouden word

Lila, een nieuwe student, komt aan op school en wordt een vijand van Ladybug wanneer deze haar vernedert. Door een akuma verandert zij in Volpina, de meesteres der illusies. Kan Volpina Ladybug en Cat

Terwijl Ladybug achter de geheime identiteit van Havikmot probeert te komen, wordt Adriens vader Gabriel  geakumeerd tot de Verzamelaar. Kunnen Ladybug en Cat Noir hem tegenhouden en Havikmot ontmaske

Nadia Chamack wordt geakumeerd tot Prime Queen. Gewapend met haar smartwatch probeert ze live op tv Ladybug en Cat Noir de bekentenis te ontfutselen dat ze verliefd zijn, omwille van de kijkcijfers. M

De legendarische Parijse ijsmaker André wordt geakumeerd door Havikmot. Als Glaciator laat hij mensen in ijs veranderen... dat daarna gaat smelten! Ladybug en Cat Noir Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten hem i

Chloé vernedert haar butler, waarna die geakumeerd wordt door Havikmot. Nu kan Despair Bear iedereen manipuleren die hij aanraakt en hij is vastbesloten om wraak te nemen op Chloé. Ladybug en Cat Noir

Penny, de assistent van Jagged Stone wordt geakumeerd tot Troublemaker. Ze loste altijd andermans problemen op, maar nu zorgt ze zelf voor problemen! Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten haar tegenhouden voorda

Een peuter wordt geakumeerd tot Gigantitan, een reuzendreumes die dwars door Parijs loopt op zoek naar een lolly en alles op zijn weg verwoest! Het zal voor Ladybug en Cat Noir geen kinderspel zijn om

Een mysterieuze gemaskerde schermer wordt geakumeerd tot  Riposte. Gewapend met haar degen wil ze wraak nemen op Adrien, die haar per ongeluk heeft vernederd. Om hem te beschermen moet Ladybug een deg
De oma van Marinette wordt geakumeerd. Als Befana wil ze wraak nemen op Marinette die liever bij haar vrienden is dan bij haar. Durft Ladybug het tegen haar eigen oma op te nemen?

Een jonge Amerikaanse zangeres wordt geakumeerd tot Frightningale. Gewapend met een magische microfoon wil ze van Parijs een gigantische musical maken. Zouden Ladybug en Cat Noir de dans ontspringen a

Adriens lijfwacht wordt geakumeerd tot Gorizilla. Met zijn buitengewone kracht en fenomenale reukzin volgt hij Adrien door heel Parijs. Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten niet op apegapen gaan liggen als ze h
Een kleine, gevoelige robot die Markov heet, wordt geakumeerd tot Robostus, een schurk die levenloze objecten tot leven kan brengen. Kunnen onze helden deze menselijke robot tot rede brengen?
Alya's zusjes worden geakumeerd tot kleine, wilde monsters, Sapoti's, die een spoor van verwoesting door Parijs achterlaten. Dat wordt een leuk oppasmiddagje voor Ladybug en Cat Noir!

Ondine, een getalenteerde zwemster, wordt geakumeerd tot Sirene. Ze heeft gevoelens voor Kim en wil van Parijs een onderwaterkoninkrijk voor haar prins maken. Kunnen Ladybug en Cat Noir het tij keren?

Meneer Damocles, het schoolhoofd, wordt geakumeerd tot Duistere Uil. Gewapend met technische snufjes wil hij wraak nemen op Ladybug en Cat Noir, die hem vernederd hebben. Onze helden moeten hem tegenh
De lieve juf Bustier wordt geakumeerd tot Zombizoen. Gewapend met een kwaadaardige zwarte lippenstift wil ze liefde verspreiden in de stad... met geweld. Ladybug en Cat Noir mogen niet verzombiezoend
Juleka's moeder wordt geakumeerd tot kapitein Hardrock. Ze staat aan het roer van een schip en bewapend met een piratenzwaard wil ze de muziek door Parijs verspreiden. Kom aan boord, matrozen Ladybug

Phillippe, een kunstschaatser, wordt geakumeerd tot Vriezer. Gewapend met kwaardaardige schaatsen wil hij van Parijs een ijskoninkrijk maken. Ladybug en Cat Noir kunnen niet over één nacht ijs gaan al
Schiolier Marc wordt geakumeerd tot de Omdraaier. Ervan overtuigd dat Marinette en Nathaniel hem voor gek zetten, wil hij wraak nemen. Kunnen Ladybug en Cat Noir de situatie nog omdraaien?

Vernederd door Gabriel Agreste wordt Chloé's moeder geakumeerd tot de Stijlkoningin. Gewapend met een scepter is ze uit op wraak en valt Adrien aan. Kan Ladybug haar tegenhouden nu Chat Noir haar niet

Nadat ze is veranderd in de Bijenkoningin om indruk te maken op haar moeder, wordt Chloé geakumeerd tot Wespenkoningin. Kunnen Ladybug en Cat Noir de transformatie van superheld tot superschurk stoppe

Burgemeester Bourgeois is het zat om het sulletje te zijn en daarom maakt Havikmot hem almachtig. Marinette roept verrassend de hulp in van Chloe als Bijenkoningin, omdat het haar vader is en Marinett
Alya’s zus Nora wordt geakumeerd tot Anansi. Als reuzenspinnevrouw wil ze Alya laten zien hoe gevaarlijk Parijs kan zijn. Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten zwaargewichten zijn om haar te stoppen!

Havikmot heeft een jongetje geakumeerd tot Klaas Soms, die de nachtmerries van mensen werkelijkheid laat worden. Marinette en Cat Noir kunnen alleen niet transformeren omdat alle Kwami's bij elkaar zi

Havikmot bereidt zich voor op het allesbeslissende gevecht tussen goed en kwaad en laat daarom alle vlinders vrij. Zo creëert hij een enorm schurkenleger. Maar Marinette regelt met een paar Miraculuse

Het team van de vijf superhelden neemt het op tegen een leger superschurken van Havikmot, die zich voor de gelegenheid heeft gezelfakumeerd tot Purpermot. Het Kwaad wordt overwonnen en Havikmot/Gabrie

Door toedoen van Ladybug wordt een Kerstman geakumeerd door Havikmot. Als Kerstmaniak wil hij dat deze kerst de ergste wordt uit de geschiedenis van Parijs. Kunnen Ladybug en Cat Noir Kerstmis nog red

Lila is terug van 'wereldreis' en liegt de hele boel bij elkaar in de klas. De gemoederen lopen zo hoog op dat Havikmot haar akumeert tot Kameleon, die de gave bezit te veranderen in degene die zij ee
Havikmot akumeert de regisseur tot Animaestro, die in allerlei verschillende animatiegedaanten en -stijlen dood en verderf zaait.
Marinettes vader wordt Bakkerix. Met zijn krachten vernietigd hij alles dat te modern is. Zullen Ladybug & Cat Noir dat taaie koekje verslaan?

Marianne, de jeugdliefde van Meester Fu heeft haar hele leven op hem gewacht, maar denkt nu abusievelijk dat hij haar vergeefs heeft laten wachten. Havikmot akumeert haar tot Terugspoeler, die tijd te
Ladybug en Cat Noir wisselen per ongeluk van miraculous en moeten zo elkaars talenten leren om Reflekpop te kunnen stoppen.

Tom, de vader van Marinette, wordt boos als hij denkt dat Cat Noir haar hart gebroken heeft. Havikmot akumeert hem tot Beschermheer, een soort wolf die zijn dochter gevangen houdt in een gevangenis va

Luka is zo boos op platendief Bob Roth dat Havikmot hem kan akumeren tot Zwijgelaar, die de kracht heeft om mensen hun stem af te nemen en zelf te gebruiken. Zelfs Marinette raakt haar stem kwijt en k
Kagami wordt Oni-Chan. Gewapend met een magisch masker wil ze Lila weghouden van Adrien... voorgoed. Zullen Ladybug en Cat Noir met haar kunnen redeneren?
Sabrina wordt geaccumatiseerd door Hawk Moth. Als Miraculer kan ze krachten van superhelden stelen en is vastbesloten om Chloe te laten zien dat ze net zo krachtig is als Lieveheersbeestje.

Alya en Nino zijn samen geakumeerd tot Vergeet-me-niet, die de macht heeft om de geheugens van mensen te wissen. Marinette en Adrien komen er langzaam achter dat ze Ladybug en Cat Noir zijn, en dat ze
Ladybug neemt het op tegen Desperada, een geakumeerde gitarist.

De moeder van Max wordt geakumeerd tot Stertrein. Ze bestuurt nu een vliegende trein waarmee ze haar droom om astronaut te worden wil laten uitkomen. Het wordt een missie op grote hoogte van Ladybug e

Mevrouw Mendeleiev wordt geakumeerd in Kwami-jager. Ze wil Tikki en Plaagvangen om de wereld te laten zien dat deze magische wezens echt bestaan! Ladybug en Cat Noir moeten hun geheim koste wat kost b
Een oud sentimonster dat miraculuses eet wordt weer tot leven gewekt. Meester Fu bekent dat hij het in zijn jonge jaren gecreëerd heeft.

Max heeft een nieuwe videogame gemaakt waarin geakumeerde schurken tegen elkaar kunnen vechten. Maar niemand kan hem helpen met testen omdat iedereen het druk heeft. Marinette zou graag helpen, maar z
Aurore wordt geakumeerd en vernietigt (buiten beeld) bijna de hele wereld maar gelukkig steken Ladybug en Cat Noir daar (buiten beeld) een stokje voor. Met een enorm aantal flashbacks wordt duidelijk

Op Vriendschapsdag wordt er een grote spuurtocht gehouden in Parijs. Er worden willekeurige tweetallen gevormd die een beroemdheid moeten zoeken, en die beroemdheid is Adrien! Marinette is enthousiast

Nadat ze Meneer Duif hebben verslagen, staan Laydug en Cat Noir oog in oog met een mysterieuze superschurk: Tijdspuiter. Hij beweert uit de toekomst gestuurd te zijn door Havikmot, over wie hij nog wa
Wanneer Adriens vader weg is, besluiten Nino en zijn vrienden Adrien thuis te verrassen. Het groeit uit tot een groot feest, maar één iemand voelt zich gepasseerd: Wayhem, de grootste fan van Adrien.
